title: Create a BigQuery reservation
description: Creates a reservation in a specified project and location. A reservation represents a block of dedicated BigQuery query processing capacity that can be allocated for your organization's workloads.

objective.narrative: This sample demonstrates how to programmatically create a BigQuery reservation. Automating the provisioning of dedicated query capacity is a common need for customers who want to manage BigQuery costs and ensure predictable performance for critical workloads, especially as part of an infrastructure-as-code setup.
